mapper.select: SELECT id, title FROM chippy_article WHERE del_flag = 1 ORDER BY crt_time DESC LIMIT #{num}

SELECT id, title, half_content, cover, author FROM chippy_article WHERE del_flag = 1
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%','${search}','%')) OR (half_content LIKE CONCAT('%','${search}','%')) OR (author LIKE CONCAT('%','${search}','%'))
ORDER BY crt_time DESC
SELECT id, title FROM chippy_article WHERE del_flag = 1 ORDER BY `count` DESC LIMIT #{num}
SELECT id, title FROM chippy_article WHERE `type` = #{type} AND del_flag = 1 ORDER BY `count` DESC LIMIT #{num}

SELECT ca.id, ca.title, ca.content, ca.half_content AS halfContent, ca.cover, ca.author, ct.`name` typeName, ca.count, ca.type, ca.crt_time AS crtTime, ca.upd_time AS updTime, ca.crt_user AS crtUser, ca.upd_user AS updUser, ca.del_flag AS delFlag FROM chippy_article AS ca INNER JOIN chippy_tag AS ct ON ca.type = ct.id WHERE ca.id = #{id}
